q: 89-Year-Old Comedienne Shows She Still Knows How To Party Betty White turned 89 on Tuesday and showed that she still knows how to party. Appearing on The Late Show With David Letterman , Betty White told the late night host that playing with animals and drinking vodka are some of her hobbies.
